titles.title: A joint resolution to provide for the issuance of a commemorative postage stamp in honor of Patience Lovell Wright.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Requires the Postmaster General to issue a postage stamp in honor of Patience Lovell Wright.
